creditline: Lent by the Frederick R. Weisman Art Museum, University of Minnesota, the Nancy and Warren MacKenzie Fund
description: brown, red and tan; irregularly shaped (widest at middle); two circular indentations on one side of top
text: Since studying at New York College of Ceramics at Alfred University, Karen Karnes has remained an independent ceramist.  She has refused to ally herself with one institution or group of artists.  Karnes is most influenced by the discipline and simplicity of Asian philosophy.  This Asian influence can be seen in the organic softness of this wood-fired vessel form.
title: Vessel
